mainData.title: Learn How to Build Clone Of Netflix Using React.JS

header.title: Learn How to Build Clone Of
header.desc: For SDEs with 1+ years working Exp

aboutUs.title: About the Masterclass
aboutUs.desc: The Web as envisaged, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past and Full Stack development is the way ahead. Building a Netflix clone using React. JS is a rocky and fun adventure for any web developer. Building user interfaces for applications like Netflix becomes comfortable with React and React.JS adds up to the fancy for completing the page. This makes it a very in demand field to be studied and pursued upon. And here we are!
aboutUs.desc1: Join Udai Kiran in his Masterclass on September 10 and 11, Saturday and Sunday respectively, at 10 AM to 1 PM and learn
aboutUs.strong: how to Build a Netflix Clone Using React.JS
aboutUs.desc2: and stay hyped up as you not only watch the technologies develop but also be a part of it.

feature.title: Full Stack Masterclass Features
feature.p1: With expert guidance and assistance attain your learning purpose and goals.
feature.p2: All our Full stack experts will lead the 100% live sessions.
feature.p3: Achieve an acknowledged certification as you attend the training.

profile.list3: Full Stack corporate Trainer with 10+ years experience .
profile.list4: Worked on various technologies like Python, JavaScript, Java, Ruby and it's related libraries and frameworks.
profile.list5: Clients Handled: Infosys, Sony, Deloitte, L&T, and many more

whyUs.title: What will you Learn?
whyUs.l1: Learn to build clone of Netflix using React.JS as front-end and Firebase as back-end
whyUs.l2: Create Home page, sign-in and sign-up page, browse page and movie player
whyUs.l3: Work on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.JS in a real-time scenario
whyUs.l4: Gain hands-on project experience in React.Js

whoCan.title: This masterclass is for
whoCan.para1: Software developers who are aiming to accelerate their respective careers by upskilling with Full stack development.
whoCan.para2: Professionals, irrespective of their domains, who have great enthusiasm to make a career transition into Full stack    development.
whoCan.para3: Skillslash Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.

About.title: About Skillslash Academy
About.desc: Skillslash Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.
About.para1: We provide project-based certification platform for professionals. Being the leading training provider, we give you the opportunity to work directly with industry experts on latest projects.
About.para2: We provide real-time work experience, Guaranteed job referral, customizable courses and project certification from top startups.
About.para3: Our training allows you to develop your abilities and get employed in top businesses. We aim at upgrading your skill set and get first preference in the hiring process.
